Header: More than 220 Pre School Kids Visit Palali Airport
Content: A group of pre-school students were facilitated to visit the Palali Airport on Friday (12) by the Commander, Security Forces - Jaffna, Major General Darshana Hettiarrachchi. The gesture was aimed at improving harmony and good relations among communities who are living in the Northern Peninsula. Kids in the Rural Development Society Pre-School in Urumpirai South, the Shakthi Pre-School of the Tholpuram Central Community Centre and the Sellappa Pre-School of Urumpirai jointly visited the airport along with the principals, teachers and parents of the schools. The number of visitors added up to a total of 224 where each and every visitor was offered refreshments by Army personnel during their visit.
